name: Bagnan Human Rural Development Society
briefDescription: BHRDS is a not for profit making social welfare organisation working for the down trodden since 2004. It is managed by a group of dedicated youth and it has impacted a lot to the rural and urban population of Howrah, West Bengal. Specially Bagnan-I & II, Amta-I & II, Uluberia-I Block and Uluberia Municipality are coverage area of the organisation.
